title: Stress Resilience Mastery
description: Build unshakeable resilience and transform your relationship with stress

questions.question: What is the difference between stress and resilience?
options: Stress is bad; resilience is good
Stress is the challenge; resilience is the capacity to recover

questions.question: What role does recovery play in building resilience?
options: Recovery is optional if you're tough enough
Recovery is essential - resilience is built in the rest, not the stress
Recovery only matters for physical stress

subtitle: Bend without breaking
